body.description: We believe in the power of blends to provide nourishing care for your hair. Our refreshing blend of coconut water and sustainably sourced aloe vera is mother nature's most quenching recipe for hydrated, silky smooth hair. Both paraben and silicone free, this blend weightlessly cleanses and refreshes normal hair. Blended makes us better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this instead of the honey treasures and was disappointed at how thin it was, I was not thinking it could do much for my hair but I was so wrong. my hair is down to my tailbone and I used about 3 pumps, my hair is typically VERY frizzy and poofy and this made my hair smooth and straight (I am white with wavy hair) just from air drying. I am seriously so impressed I have never had a conditioner replace a smoothing serum. my husband also used it and has typically dry hair with some dry scalp and I have not seen any flakes and his hair is super soft as well (not saying this is a cure for scalp issues it just worked for him)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this, it works great and smells amazing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've been trying several conditioners the past few months to see which ones will actually DO SOMETHING for my dry hair. I've got thick hair, it's wavy, and I have recently gone back to heat styling and wanted something that would help to combat the possible damage from that among other things. Keeping hair moisturized is very important obviously. And this conditioner, compared to all others I've tried, has done a decent job of that.It doesn't cling to my hair like a lot of other conditioners do, washes off easily. I'd definitely say it feels silky right after washing it off and it doesn't weigh the hair down even though the conditioner itself feels quite concentrated. Comparing the amount of frizz I normally get to the amount I get using this conditioner is also relatively impressive. I've got frizz naturally and yet with this conditioner it feels like that amount has reduced by a noticeable amount. Also, I am not noticing nearly as many split ends as I'd normally see with heat styling. Maybe that's thanks to the deep conditioning and the heat protectant, but I'd attribute the success to the only consistent factor here: The conditioner.I haven't gone through the full bottle yet and It's been almost a month already, so for the amount you get, the price is also quite reasonable. Obviously my hair has not transformed completely, and it can still be quite unpredictable. But the overall experience I've had with this conditioner has been quite positive. I feel as though I've finally found a conditioner that actually does at least a quarter of what it claims on the packaging. Do plan on keeping this in my routine.
